ygData.subject: KS tricks + Grouping for XP
ygData.msgSnippet: Why does everyone keep telling me come to server blah blah and see how your tricks works .  I am on Tunare server and i m gona stay here and KS as long as i
ygData.messageBody:
Why does everyone keep telling me "come to server blah blah and see how
your tricks works" . I am on Tunare server and i'm gona stay here and KS as
long as i think its giving me more XP than doing something else. Anyways, ppl
on every server are just humans, some are stupid, some are smart. Some ppl
can't do dick all about me KS their kills and some will take action. So it
doesn't depend on which server you play on, you can always KS. On Tunare, not a
lot of KSer out there, i've only met 2 others who also KS on a regular basis, so
its pretty rare too. The more rare it is, the better actually, cuz most ppl
don't know how to deal with it instead of just crying how i'm taking all the xp
and challenge me to duals hahaha.

If grouping is better for XP, i will group. I power game and want to get a
few lvl 50 characters before the expansion comes out. Some of you keep saying
"when your lvl 25, see how your KS tricks work". well if they dont fucking
work, i won't use it !! are you stupid or something ? situations change, you
must adapt to gain higher XP. everything is about XP, i dont' give a shit if KS
or grouping is better. I just care if KS gives me more XP or not. i have
gaiend 4 lvls in the past few days and my RL friend only gain 1 lvl. and he
played same amount of time as i did. We were both at lvl 10 and now i am 14,
while he is only 11. We actually grouped at lvl 10 for awhile.

Even if your in a group, doesn't mean you should stop KS. I KS anytime i
have mana, when i'm in a group, i let the group fight and give me XP, but while
thats going on, i see someone else fighting then i take their kill too. then i
get more xp than if i was to wait for the group to med up and shit.

When i get to lvl 20 and see that KS is no good, then i will stop. Simple
as that. If it gives no XP , why do it ??

PS. if they give player bonus XP cuz they role play and make the game better, i
will role play as well.



Re:
come KS on RZ and u'll be eating dirt after the first cpl tricks :) I don't
even know if anybody knows what kill stealing is on RZ cause it just doesn't
happen.

and if u read my post, i said it's fine to do what ur doing with melee at
lvl 13 (hey, its actually effective up to a certain point). but once u hit
the mid 20's and higher ur little trick just won't work. u will either have
to root or run... or get u a good tank and cleric (it's called a balanced
group, something required at higher lvls :)

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek
